verbs.description: atiku if i [V: 'm] elected president i wo n't wait six months to name my cabinet atiku expressed his readiness to have a definite selection of his cabinet members even before his swearing - in as president if he wins in the 2019 general election peter obi anambra state africa sahara reporters six months peoples democratic party president cabinet atiku atiku abubakar
